name: Assemble That!
description:
Assemble That! is a drag and drop puzzle game about building an assembly-like code that matches a piece of C#-like code of a challenge as main objective. There are multiple solutions for each challenge, the best solution is the one with the least cycle cost. Show your best result with us!

Submission for Extra Credits Game Jam #3 theme "cycle", as cycle for computing cycle cost.

Extract the .zip into a folder, run "Assemble That ECGJ.exe" to start the game.
